Table of Contents

Class DrawNode

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Contains all the information required to draw a single Drawable. A hierarchy of DrawNodes is passed to the draw thread for rendering every frame.

public class DrawNode : IDisposable

DrawNode(IDrawable)

Creates a new DrawNode.

public DrawNode(IDrawable source)

Parameters

source IDrawable

The Drawable to draw with this DrawNode.

Properties

CanDrawOpaqueInterior

Whether this DrawNode can draw a opaque interior. DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer) will only be invoked if this value is 

true
. Should not return 
true
if DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer) will result in a no-op. 
protected virtual bool CanDrawOpaqueInterior { get; }

Property Value

bool

DrawColourInfo

Contains the colour and blending information of this DrawNode.

protected DrawColourInfo DrawColourInfo { get; }

Property Value

DrawColourInfo

DrawInfo

Contains the linear transformation of this DrawNode.

protected DrawInfo DrawInfo { get; }

Property Value

DrawInfo

HasOwnOpaqueInterior

Whether this DrawNode has its own opaque interior. If false, a child of the DrawNode may be the source of the opaque interior.

protected virtual bool HasOwnOpaqueInterior { get; }

Property Value

bool

InvalidationID

Identifies the state of this draw node with an invalidation state of its corresponding Drawable. An update is required when the invalidation state of this draw node disagrees with the invalidation state of its Drawable.

protected long InvalidationID { get; }

Property Value

long

IsDisposed 

protected bool IsDisposed { get; }

Property Value

bool

Source

The Drawable which this DrawNode draws.

protected IDrawable Source { get; }

IDrawable

Methods

ApplyState()

Applies the state of Source to this DrawNode for use in rendering. The applied state must remain immutable.

public virtual void ApplyState()

Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

Dispose(bool) 

protected virtual void Dispose(bool isDisposing)

Parameters

isDisposing bool

Draw(IRenderer)

Draws this DrawNode to the screen.

protected virtual void Draw(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to draw with.

Remarks

Subclasses must invoke 

base.Draw()
prior to drawing vertices.

DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer)

Draws the opaque interior of this DrawNode to the screen, if CanDrawOpaqueInterior indicates that an opaque interior can be drawn. The opaque interior must be a fully-opaque, non-blended area of this DrawNode, clipped to the current masking area via 

DrawClipped()
. See SpriteDrawNode for an example implementation. 
protected virtual void DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to draw with.

Remarks

Subclasses must invoke 

base.DrawOpaqueInterior()
prior to drawing vertices.
